def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_smaller = is_smaller(x, y, ctx)
        check_xy_lighter = is_lighter(x, y, ctx)
        check_x_left_y = is_left(x, y, ctx)
        check_xy_slightly_larger = is_larger(x, y, ctx) and abs(get_distance(x, y, ctx) - 10) < 1e-6
        if (
            check_xy_smaller
            and check_xy_lighter
            and check_x_left_y
            and check_xy_slightly_larger
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

* New dots A B C

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_xyz_gray = all([is_medium_size(dot, ctx) and is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_z_lighter = is_lighter(z, lightest([x,y,z], ctx), ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_xyz_gray
            and check_z_lighter
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
